original_title: UFC Fight Night 72: Bisping vs. Leites
overview: UFC Fight Night 72: Bisping vs. Leites was a mixed martial arts event held on July 18, 2015 at the The SSE Hydro in Glasgow, Scotland. The event was headlined by a middleweight bout between veteran contender Michael Bisping and former title challenger Thales Leites.
title: UFC Fight Night 72: Bisping vs. Leites
